attributes.action: Allow President Trump Royal Visit. As many are against him &Brexit
attributes.additional_details: To oppose the current petition to ban one leader to visit UK for Royal visit . We are not being represented fully and need to show support that Not all British people are against the Visit nor the man Despite his contriversal Ideas he does stand for sensible idwas on how to look after his Country he won through a vote of the people.We as people also need voice. our own many patriots are being silenced and denied Democracy as with Trump &Brexit undemocratics are trying to reverse the Will of many
attributes.background: We the British people are hearing and seeing many stories about President Trump our Sovereign has offered the hand of friendship in a Royal visit and like myself and many are in favour to see him visit our Queen. The media and some politicians do not represent us and we need to voice ourselves .
